title: Spacious clean condo 3BR 2 Bath and bonus space
posting_body: ['•\tRent: $3,800/month', '•\tBeds: 3', '•\tBaths: 2', '•\tAvailable Date: 9/1/2022', '•\tPets: Considered', '•\tParking: 2 off-street parking spots', '•\tLease term: One year', '•\tUtilities: Water and sewer included, tenant pays gas heat & hot water and electricity', '•\tNo fee', 'Please use the EMAIL feature within Craigslist to contact us; we will reply promptly with a phone number for follow up.', 'Thank you!', '3 bed 2 bath', '3 floor condo in townhouse duplex', 'Eat-in kitchen with tile floor', 'Open plan kitchen & dining room', 'Hardwood floors throughout', 'High ceilings', 'Semi-finished attic carpeted', '2 driveway parking spots', 'Free laundry in unit', 'Gas heat', 'Large closets', 'Basement and attic storage', 'Bonus alcove room on second floor', '2,100 sq ft plus semi-finished attic space', 'First, last and security deposit', 'Walk to 73 & 71 MBTA bus', 'Elementary School area: Hosmer', 'Available September 1, 2022', 'Non-smoking only', 'Pet considered']
